summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Vashon Place, from West Othello Street to West Fontanelle Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8843 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
